turns.content:
| # | Broad Topics | Website | Email | Tip |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Health, Nutrition, Food | Healthline | [guestpost@healthline.com](mailto:guestpost@healthline.com) | Make sure your article is backed by scientific evidence |
| 2 | Food, Lifestyle | The Spruce Eats | [contact@thespruceeats.com](mailto:contact@thespruceeats.com) | Pitch a unique angle to stand out from other food bloggers |
| 3 | Food, Cooking, Recipes | RecipeLion | [editor@recipelion.com](mailto:editor@recipelion.com) | Include step-by-step instructions and high-quality photos with your recipe |
| 4 | Food, Health, Nutrition | EatingWell | [eatingwell@meredith.com](mailto:eatingwell@meredith.com) | Use data and research to support your claims about the health benefits of fresh fruit |
| 5 | Health, Wellness, Fitness | Well+Good | [submissions@wellandgood.com](mailto:submissions@wellandgood.com) | Focus on the ways in which fresh fruit can contribute to overall wellness and health |
| 6 | Food, Cooking, Recipes | Food52 | [submissions@food52.com](mailto:submissions@food52.com) | Make sure your recipe is unique and innovative, and include personal anecdotes or stories to add interest |
| 7 | Food, Cooking, Recipes | Delish | [pitches@delish.com](mailto:pitches@delish.com) | Use eye-catching headlines and appealing photos to make your recipe stand out |
| 8 | Food, Cooking, Recipes | Simply Recipes | [contact@simplyrecipes.com](mailto:contact@simplyrecipes.com) | Keep your recipe simple and accessible for beginner cooks |
| 9 | Food, Cooking, Recipes | The Kitchn | [pitches@thekitchn.com](mailto:pitches@thekitchn.com) | Focus on seasonal fruit and provide tips for storing and preparing it |
| 10 | Food, Cooking, Recipes | Taste of Home | [tasteofhome@tmbi.com](mailto:tasteofhome@tmbi.com) | Include variations on classic fruit recipes or unique flavor combinations |

need these websites for a fresh cut fruit subscription based in mumbai

Sure, here are 5 guest posting websites for the niche of fresh cut fruit subscription based in Mumbai:

| # | Broad Topics | Website | Email | Tip |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Food, Health, Nutrition | Pinkvilla | [editorial@pinkvilla.com](mailto:editorial@pinkvilla.com) | Focus on the health benefits of fresh cut fruit and their role in a balanced diet |
| 2 | Food, Lifestyle | Mumbai Foodie | [mumbaifoodie@gmail.com](mailto:mumbaifoodie@gmail.com) | Highlight the convenience and variety offered by a fresh cut fruit subscription service |
| 3 | Food, Recipes, Restaurants | Burrp! | [editorial@burrp.com](mailto:editorial@burrp.com) | Write about recipes featuring fresh cut fruit or restaurants in Mumbai offering fruit-centric dishes |
| 4 | Health, Fitness, Lifestyle | Femina | [femina@wwm.co.in](mailto:femina@wwm.co.in) | Discuss the ways in which fresh cut fruit can contribute to an active and healthy lifestyle |
| 5 | Food, Recipes, Health | Archana's Kitchen | [support@archanaskitchen.com](mailto:support@archanaskitchen.com) | Share healthy fruit-based recipes or talk about the nutritional benefits of different types of fruit |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
